name: BIRTHDAY CAKE
description: Vanilla sponge cake with confetti sprinkles baked in. Filled with vanilla whipped cream and frosted with a funfetti buttercream (confetti sprinkles mixed with buttercream). Decorated naked with a few jimmies sprinkled on top.

name: STRAWBERRY CAKE
description: Our classic vanilla chiffon cake layered with fresh strawberry cream and then topped with strawberry buttercream, in our signature ombre design.

name: FULL COLOR CAKE
description: Our sinfully delicious devil's food cake layered with whipped cream, topped with vanilla buttercream, and finished with colorful jimmies.

name: SALTED CARAMEL CAKE
description: Our sinfully delicious devil's food cake layered with burnt caramel Bavarian, and then topped with caramel buttercream. In a grand finale, we drizzle the top with ganache and Maldon salt.

name: GOURMAND
description: Our sinfully delicious devil's food cake layered and topped with decadent E Guittard 81% chocolate frosting.

name: RED VELVET CAKE
description: Our rich red velvet chocolate cake layered and topped with cream cheese icing.

name: CARROT CAKE
description: Carrot Cake studded with pineapple, raisins and walnuts — then layered and topped with cream cheese icing. (It counts as a serving of veggies!).

name: LEMON PASSIONFRUIT CAKE
description: Our classic vanilla chiffon cake layered with lemon whipped cream and then topped with passionfruit buttercream in our signature ombre design. Need to Build Your Own Cake?.

name: NE-O COOKIE CAKE
description: Our rich devil’s food cake layered with a filling that tastes just like your favorite childhood cookie and topped with whipped cream and mini oreos.
